import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Disclosure, Menu, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { BellIcon, MenuIcon, XIcon } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Logo from "../img/logo.png"; import { AuthContext } from "./../context/authContext"; const navigation = [ { name: "Art", href: "/?cat=art", current: true }, { name: "Science", href: "/?cat=science", current: false }, { name: "Technology", href: "/?cat=technology", current: false }, { name: "Cinema", href: "/?cat=cinema", current: false }, { name: "Design", href: "/?cat=design", current: false }, { name: "Food", href: "/?cat=food", current: false }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" "); } export default function NNavbar() { const { currentUser, logout } = useContext(AuthContext); return ( {({ open }) => ( <>
{/* Mobile menu button*/} Open main menu {open ? ( ) : ( )}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{/* Profile dropdown */}
Open user menu
Add A New Post {({ active }) => ( {currentUser?.username} )} {currentUser ? ( Logout ) : ( Login )}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
)} ); }
